page.title: Advogato Syndication
page.p: Advogato headlines are now available in RSS format at http://www.advogato.org/rss/articles.xml.
A wave of the paw to Martijn van Beers for adding the feature. He asked for it, I responded "well, why don't you add it?" And in true free software style, he did.
Advogato is now syndicated on tigert's fabulous portal page, as well as a Slashbox on Slashdot.
